ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue:
"CUDA: Heart of Darkness" by Tim Vigil, Tim Tyler and Kimberley Richardson
"The Crow: Inertia" by James O'Barr
"Street Shadows: True Love" by Kyle Garrett, Mark Bloodworth and Vince Locke
"Thrill-Kill" by Mark Winfrey and Daniel Roy McKinnon
"Nightstreets: A Preview" by Mark Bloodworth and Randy Zimmerman
"IO" by Barbed Wire Halo Studios
This issue features the first appearance of James O'Barr's The Crow and Tim Vigil's Cuda.
